menu_items.name: Father's Day BBQ at Prairie Fire
menu_items.detail:
$29 adults, $12 kids 12 & under
Sunday, June 16th 4-8pm

Live Grill Station
Baby Back Ribs : chipotle BBQ sauce
Carolina BBQ Chicken : Carolina BBQ sauce
Grilled Brats : grilled peppers, caramelized onions, lager beer

Sides
Molasses Baked Beans : applewood bacon
Chili Verde Mac & Cheese : jalapeno chips, white cheddar
Grilled Summer Corn : herb butter, cotija, sea salt
Honey Butter Corn Bread

Cold Station
Apple Cider Coleslaw
Baby Red Potato Salad : chives, applewood bacon, fresh dill
Classic Mac Salad

Dessert Station
Cherry Cobbler
Apple Strudel
Mini Pecan Pie
Assorted Cheesecake : whiskey walnut praline, chocolate peanut butter
Assorted Shooters : banana cream pie, strawberry shortcake
Assorted Cookies

menu_items.name: Father's Day Brunch at Belvedere Room
menu_items.detail:
$39 adults, $15 kids 12 & under
Sunday, June 16th 9am-2pm

Carving Station
Dijon Peppercorn Crusted Prime Rib : au jus and horseradish cream
Bourbon Glazed Pork Loin : house made apple sauce

Seafood Station
King Crab Legs : drawn butter
Shrimp Cocktail : Sriracha lime cocktail sauce
Salmon Lox : dill cream cheese, toasted bagel chips

Salad Station
Padre Caesar Salad
Roasted Beet Salad : arugula, blue cheese, candied walnuts
Displayed Wheels of Cheese : assorted jams, nuts, dried fruits
Sliced Charcuterie : assorted pickled vegetables, classic condiments
Yogurt & Granola : honey, fresh berries

Brunch Buffet
Padre Signature Fried Chicken : fried thyme
Elk Meatloaf : mushroom gravy and baby red smashed potatoes
Shrimp Scampi : heirloom tomato, capers, garlic butter sauce, herbs
Roasted Salmon : corn off the cob, tequila lime cream, cotija cheese
Crispy Brussel Sprouts : applewood bacon, blue cheese, candied pecans

Smoked Blue Cheese Creamed Kale
Rosemary Roasted Red Potatoes
Smoked Gouda Au Gratin Potatoes : bacon, caramelized onion

Breakfast Buffet
Cheddar Biscuits with Chorizo Gravy
Jalapeno Cornbread with Honey Butter
Ranchero Scrambled Eggs : cotija cheese, ranchero sauce
Chilaquiles Verde
Applewood Bacon
Breakfast Sausage Links
Prime Rib Hash
Cheddar Bacon Silver Dollar Pancakes
Peach Bourbon French Toast
Cherry Cobbler

Dessert Station
Apple Strudel
Mini Pecan Pie
Assorted Cheesecake : whiskey walnut praline, chocolate peanut butter
Assorted Shooters : banana cream pie, strawberry shortcake
Assorted Cookies
